alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Coweta (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 8:42PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Carroll and northwestern Coweta Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 842 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Arnco-Sargent, or near Newnan. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Newnan, Whitesburg, Dunaway Gardens, Plant Yates, Byers Crossroads, Arnco-Sargent, Roscoe, Seaton Lake and Madras. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
